Comments_List: The course provided thorough materials to practice our knowledge of Latin grammar
I became much more comfortable with reading latin literature.
This course provided me with an excellent foundation for reading and understanding Latin
More quizzes and assignments would have helped me to stay more focused
It was a very good course and it was quite well organized to focus on practice in a relaxed setting.
Can't think how it could be improved.
Absolutely, it provides the necessary practice to hone your skills in Latin grammar
Most definitely. Professor Robinson is an extremely kind and funny professor. It was quite an enjoyable class, even though it did meet every day during the summer.

I would very much recommend this course to anyone who wants to learn Latin in a very engaging way, in a totally free-of-stress environment, with a great amount of learning and with an excellent professor.
